text: Thaddeus Michael Bullard Sr. (born April 29, 1977), better known by his ring name Titus O'Neil, is an American professional wrestler and former American football player. He is currently signed to WWE, where he serves as the company's Global Ambassador. As an active wrestler, he won the WWE Tag Team Championship and the 24/7 Championship once (and was also the first ever 24/7 Champion). He was one half of the Prime Time Players along with Darren Young. He competed on the second season of NXT where he finished 5th and also competed on the fifth season of NXT called NXT Redemption. He played professional football in the Arena Football League for the Utah Blaze, Tampa Bay Storm, Las Vegas Gladiators and Carolina Cobras. ==Championships== *Florida Championship Wrestling **FCW Florida Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Damien Sandow *Pro Wrestling Illustrated **Ranked No. 82 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2013 *Rolling Stone **Most Deserved Push (2015) *Wrestling Observer Newsletter **Worst Feud of the Year (2016) *WWE **WWE Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Darren Young **WWE 24/7 Championship (1 time, first) **WWE Year-End Award (1 time) ***Funniest Moment of the Year (2018) – **WWE Hall of Fame (Class of 2020 – Warrior Award) ==References== ==Other websites== *Titus O'Neil at WWE.com * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:African-American wrestlers Category:American professional wrestlers Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from Florida Category:WWE Hall of Fame Category:WWE people
title: Titus O'Neil
